blogPost.excerpt: The Battle of Mars is a PVP NFT game where you can challenge each other and take your opponent's Martian away. 1. Mint a Martian (10,000 unique martians available) 2. Join a crypto faction 3. Challenge a friend and take their Martian away
blogPost.body: The Battle of Mars is a PVP NFT game where you can challenge each other and take your opponent's Martian away. 1. Mint a Martian (10,000 unique martians available) 2. Join a crypto faction 3. Challenge a friend and take their Martian away
blogPost.title: The Battle of Mars - A player vs player NFT game
blogPost.author: Mario MG

previous.excerpt: Pretty Progress allows you to add beautiful & personalized Countdown & Progress Bar widgets on your iPhone's Home Screen. Track and remind yourself about the important things on the device you use every day. Clear and convenient.
previous.title: Pretty Progress - Beautiful countdown widgets on your iPhone's home screen
